QuestData.Title: Field Mages
QuestData.Description:
Lok'tar, $r.
If you have the time, we have two mages doing fieldwork nearby who I'm sure could use a hand.
This is a dangerous land in the best of times.
These are not the best of times.
QuestData.LogDescription: Check on the Kirin Tor mages near Slyvern Plunge in the Azure Span.
